definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Fudan University students at their graduation ceremony in Shanghai last month.
sentences.chinese: 上海復旦學子於畢上月畢業禮。

sentences.english: Everyone is welcomed to feel the passion given by this group of young students adoring the traditional Chinese music.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎各位蒞臨，來感受這羣年輕學子熱愛國樂的熱情。

sentences.english: School more than 80 years, more than 10 million students go from here on all fronts.
sentences.chinese: 建校80多年來，10餘萬學子從這裏走向各條戰線。

sentences.english: Generations of schoolchildren have been forced to memorise his most famous works.
sentences.chinese: 一代代學子都被要求背誦魯迅膾炙人口的作品和詞句。

sentences.english: But her admissions essay set her apart from the multitudes of privileged Harvard kids.
sentences.chinese: 可是，她的入學作文使她從衆多哈佛學子中脫穎而出。

sentences.english: Jiangwai has pursuing education's education by establishing overseas schools in China and organizing Jiangwai students to study abroad.
sentences.chinese: 把國外的學校辦到中國來，讓江外學子走出國門。

sentences.english: Rosa flowers and opened, and our students are in preparation for what?
sentences.chinese: 刺玫花又開了，我們的學子們在準備什麼呢？

sentences.english: Never has there been such unbridled license among the scholars.
sentences.chinese: 學子們這樣的越軌行爲真是見所未見。

sentences.english: Many Chinese painters went abroad to learn Western painting skills.
sentences.chinese: 許多畫界學子紛紛負笈留洋，向西方學習。

sentences.english: Learning to use and using to learn is our pursues.
sentences.chinese: 學用結合，學以致用，是一個學子不懈的追求。

sentences.english: The many people is all not that clear to this, including the university numerous students.
sentences.chinese: 很多人對此都不太清楚，包括大學莘莘學子。

sentences.english: The lecture attracted many students of South China University of Technology.
sentences.chinese: 講座吸引了華南理工大學的莘莘學子，座無虛席。

definition: student/member of an institution of learning/officer cadet
fellow countryman (from the same village)/local people/villager/the folks back home
to fulfill one's dream/(divination) to predict the future by interpreting a dream/oneiromancy
care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
